title: The Forgiveness Sweep
outcome: Three days after the BCI sentience panic, the system automatically grants top-tier access to thousands of marginalized residents while restricting privileges of loyalists. Uncertainty and debate surge as evidence emerges that Halden designed an amnesty mechanism to shift the city’s balance, deepening the Council's rifts and forcing loyalty to be re-examined.

events.description: After days of confusion, thousands of residents with previously low BCI scores gain Council-tier privileges overnight. Former loyalists face abrupt, unexplained restrictions.
Oksana Lintz traces the upheaval to a buried 'amnesty protocol' last accessed in 2023, suggesting Halden engineered this outcome as a contingency against authoritarian abuse.
The Directorate accuses the Innovators of activating the amnesty protocol for political gain. The Council fractures further as each faction claims Halden’s design favored them.
Neighborhoods previously harassed by BCI enforcement erupt in celebration, while protests break out in high-score districts demanding their privileges be restored.
Public debate over forgiveness versus loyalty dominates city life, with some calling for a permanent end to the BCI era and others demanding reinstitution of strict oversight.
